text: Duncan Lee Hunter (born May 31, 1948) is an American politician. He was a Republican member of the House of Representatives from California's 52nd, 45th and 42nd districts from 1981 to 2009. Hunter was the chairman of the House Armed Services Committee. Hunter ran for the Republican Party nomination for President of the United States for 2008, but failed to win many votes during the primaries, and he dropped out after the Nevada Republican caucuses. Hunter was replaced in congress by his son, Duncan D. Hunter. ==References== Category:2008 United States presidential candidates Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from California Category:American political activists Category:Politicians from San Diego Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Duncan L. Hunter
